channel.title: Changing Xp Rate
channel.description:
I need help changing the xp in my server, It's kind of hard to get skill up and I wont to make it easier..
Can somebody please tell me what to do don't just say like go in client.java or client.class tell me how to do it.. and if it's a .class file what do I open it with because it just comes up with like random things when I open with notepad or wordpad....
Thank-you (IF YOU HELP ME)
